item.description:
Watch Chef Benjamin Knack on Hell’s Kitchen
Tuesdays at 8pm

Join us for viewing parties at the bar, featuring $1 oysters, $3 PBR beers, special Hell’s Kitchen cocktails, and appetizers inspired by Gordon Ramsay!

WATCH OUR CHEF BENJAMIN KNACK ON HELL’S KITCHEN
Please join us on Tuesday evenings at 8pm for live episodes of FOX’s Hell’s Kitchen reality show to watch Sel de la Terre’s own Chef Benjamin Knack compete!

Each week at Sel de la Terre Long Wharf, join us for $1 oysters and $3 PBR beers during the show, along with Hell's Kitchen-inspired cocktails and specials. Chef Knack will be available to chat about his unforgettable experience. (No, he’s not going to reveal any secrets…). Mark your calendar for the July 27 show finale!
item.name: Sel De La Terre, Long Wharf
